title: Cursed Truths: Blood of a Guardian
description: The year is 2029 and choices must be made.In the wake of a global bio-terror attack, FBI Director Skylar Sinclair-Blake must choose between containing a deadly outbreak and saving the victims trapped within Los Angeles' quarantine.For Skylar's adopted brother, Alex Zhang, the choice is personal - bury the past and accept the family he has grown to love or risk hurting them by leaving to find his birth mother on another continent.With malign forces from the past anticipating their every move, can Skylar and Alex discover the truth behind the outbreak, unmask the supernatural creatures threatening mankind, and learn how their bloodlines are entwined with a centuries old conspiracy - or will the cursed truths that govern their lives blind them to the dangers within the blood of a guardian?Merging mythology with technology, Cursed Truths is an urban fantasy thriller series for fans of Jim Butcher's The Dresden Files, Anne Rice's The Vampire Chronicles, and Laurell K. Hamilton's Anita Vampire Hunter series.Cursed Truths contain mature themes - reader discretion is advised.
author: M.J.  Harper
